backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping Valentine UI requirements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled summaries describing key frontend files, including App.tsx behavior and theme styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Valentine prompt, evasive No button logic, floating hearts, and Good Choice meme reveal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with auto‑refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic pink/white theme variables, dark mode variants, and floating heart animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point mounting App with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, and extensions for a romantic theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic Valentine web page with evasive No button and a Good choice❤️ reveal image.
